subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Disadvantaged people (poor women and men) from Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe groups, minorities and the displaced) in eight project States including two United Nations Development Assistance Framework States benefit from livelihood strategies, public expenditure and better delivery mechanisms.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: ICT for Development
